snippet.title: NBA Playgrounds 2 - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
The gameplay trailer of NBA Playgrounds 2 features a host of new additions and improvements, including a new Season Mode and a new Playgrounds Championship ranked mode. 

A massive roster of over 200 current and retired NBA players are featured with new player models and animations. There’s even improved online matchmaking with dedicated servers, four-player online matches, co-op matches, three-point contests, new playgrounds, vanity items for customization, and more!  Visit https://playgroundsgame.com for more information.
